author: newsr.in
title: BCCI to invite bids for two new teams to replace CSK and Rajasthan Royals in IPL 2016 and 2017
text: 18 Oct 2015BCCI, Board for Control of Cricket in Indias, working committees meeting was held today in Mumbai .A Number of decisions were taken during the meeting including implementation of Justice Lodha committee. »
